comment: @adam_ratcliffe The most affected country is China which is Asian and those over 60 have been affected more than any other group so far so Id say it was pretty representative. A picture of a white baby in a mask or a black teenage girl would make no sense for a virus whose epicentre is China
@moomoobuddy1 So 3 students in Manchester is representative of a town in China?
@adam_ratcliffe What do 3 students in Manchester have to do with your tweet which stated that pictures of Asians in masks was racist?
Can someone please tell me how every news outlet using any old picture of Asian people in face masks to scaremonger about this coronavirus  isnt horrifically racist!?
@adam_ratcliffe I realised that after Id tweeted. I dont think its intended to be racist at all but it is an irrelevant image. Three U.K. students have bot all to do with the outbreak.
